org.obrel.type

Class ListenerTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.type.ListenerTypes

  • public class ListenerTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains standard event listener relation types and event listener type factory methods.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • RELATION_LISTENERS

        public static final RelationType<EventDispatcher<RelationEvent<?>>> RELATION_LISTENERS
        A relation type for the registration of relation listeners on relatable objects. A relation listener is notified of all changes to relations of the parent object it is set on. Will be initialized automatically so it is not necessary to check for existence before accessing the relation.

      • RELATION_TYPE_LISTENERS

        public static final RelationType<EventDispatcher<RelationEvent<?>>> RELATION_TYPE_LISTENERS
        A relation type for the registration of event listeners on relation types. A relation type listener is notified of all changes to relations with the type it is set on. Setting a relation type listener on any other type of object than a relation type will have no effect. A RELATION_LISTENERS on a relation type will have the same function as on any other object, i.e will be notified of changes to the (meta-relations) of the relation type.

        Will be initialized automatically so it is not necessary to check for existence before accessing the relation.

      • RELATION_UPDATE_LISTENERS

        public static final RelationType<EventDispatcher<RelationEvent<?>>> RELATION_UPDATE_LISTENERS
        A relation type for the registration of update listeners on relations. A relation update listener is notified of all changes to the relation it is set on. Setting a relation update listener on any other type of object than a relation will have no effect. A RELATION_LISTENERS on a relation will have the same function as on any other object, i.e will be notified of changes to the (meta-relations) of the relation.

        Will be initialized automatically so it is not necessary to check for existence before accessing the relation.

    • Method Detail

      • newListenerType

        public static <L,E> ListenerType<L,E> newListenerType(RelationTypeModifier... rModifiers)
        Creates a new ListenerType instance without a default event dispatcher. The notification of event listeners must be done by providing an explicit event dispatch function to the method ListenerType.notifyListeners(Object, Object, BiConsumer).
        See Also:
        ListenerType.ListenerType(BiConsumer, RelationTypeModifier...)

      • newListenerType

        public static <L,E> ListenerType<L,E> newListenerType(java.util.function.BiConsumer<L,E> fDispatcher,
                                                      RelationTypeModifier... rModifiers)
        Creates a new ListenerType instance.
        See Also:
        ListenerType.ListenerType(BiConsumer, RelationTypeModifier...)
